data.comment: The match is underway at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 2, Marinho of Santos is pulled up for offside.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Santos Internacional drive forward through Rodinei. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Edenilson for Internacional who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 9, Edenilson returns to the field for Internacional after picking up a slight injury.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) has replaced the possibly injured Edenilson at Urbano Caldeira.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Santos throw-in in Internacional's half.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Internacional at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Santos.
In the minute 23, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 25, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marinho.
Marinho for Santos is back on the field again.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 27, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Internacional drives forward and Thiago Galhardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 28, Free kick Internacional.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 30, Santos to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 33, Santos's Luan Peres is on target but unsuccessful.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 35, Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) gets booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Internacional.
Santos pushes forward through Marinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 41, Santos have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Wagner Leonardo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Santos Internacional's Marcos Guilherme is caught offside.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Internacional drive forward but Thiago Galhardo is judged offside.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Internacional.
Santos have a dangerous throw-in.
Santos's Luan Peres breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
The first-half is over at Urbano Caldeira.
Kaio Jorge (Santos) gets a yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 49, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Internacional's area.
Abel Hernandez for Internacional drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 51, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Thiago Galhardo (Internacional) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 52, Santos's Wagner Leonardo is back in action after a slight knock.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 55, Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Internacional's Abel Hernandez has run offside.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Santos.
In the minute 56, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Santos's half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 58, Internacional's Rodinei has been booked in Santos.
Goal! Ivonei gives Santos a 1-0 lead in Santos.
Ivonei instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 61, Abel Hernandez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Abel Hernandez (Internacional) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yuri Alberto.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 63, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Santos.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Braga for Santos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 68, Thiago Galhardo (Internacional) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Santos defenders.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Santos.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Lucas Braga is back on the pitch.
In the minute 69, Santos move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Kaio Jorge is the scorer with a header!
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 74, Internacional's Yuri Alberto gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Santos's half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andres D'Alessandro is replacing Rodrigo Dourado for the away team.
In the minute 77, Internacional make their fourth substitution with Leandro Fernandez replacing Marcos Guilherme.
Praxedes is replacing Mauricio for Internacional at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 78, Cuca is making the team's first substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Tailson replacing Kaio Jorge.
Throw-in for Internacional at Urbano Caldeira.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Santos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 84, Santos needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Internacional.
Free kick in a good position for Internacional!
In the minute 88, Internacional's Leandro Fernandez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Santos.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional just outside Santos's area.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Santos a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Santos. The final score is 2-0.
The home team have replaced Lucas Braga with Marcos Leonardo. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
